name: 10 Degrees of Mr. Nicolas Cage Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Nicolas Cage starred with James Caan in this 1992 comedy about a guy who loses his fiance to a gambler while in Las Vegas.  Can you name the movie?
questions.explanation:
Honeymoon in Vegas.

	This film co-starred Sarah Jessica Parker and Tony Shaloub.

questions.text: A popular novelist is rescued from a car accident by his number one fan and then held hostage by her.  What James Caan and Kathy Bates film am I referring to?
questions.explanation:
Misery.

	Kathy Bates was awarded the Oscar for Best Actress in a Leading Role for her outstanding performance as Annie Wilkes.

questions.text: Kathy Bates starred in a film about a man who tries to deal with life in Nebraska following the death of his wife.  She shared a hot tub scene with Jack Nicholson in this 2002 dark comedy.  Can you guess which film it is?
questions.explanation:
About Schmidt.

	Jack has been quoted as saying that Kathy did beautifully at her full nude scene for their time together in the hot tub.  Jack was also nominated for his 12th Oscar for his role of Warren Schmidt.

questions.text: Can people really ever learn to control their anger?  Jack Nicholson co-starred along side Adam Sandler in this 2003 comedy.
questions.explanation:
Anger Management.

	Adam Sandler stars in this film about a man who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management class.  This film co-stars Marisa Tomei and Luis Guzman.

questions.text: Boy gets jilted at the altar.  Boy gets extremely bitter.  Boy falls in love with a waitress who thinks she is in love with a jerk.  What was this Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore comedy?
questions.explanation:
The Wedding Singer.

	This funny comedy set in the late 1980's has a cameo of the 80s pop star Billy Idol.  The film also co-starred Christine Taylor and Alexis Arquette.

questions.text: A lovable little alien wanders away from his spaceship and takes up residence with a little boy named Elliott.  What was this Drew Barrymore and Peter Coyote film am I referring to?
questions.explanation:
E.T.

	"E.T." was the biggest box office grossing film for over fifteen years until it was knocked out by "Titanic".  This tearjerker also starred Dee Wallace Stone and Henry Thomas.

questions.text: Two women go on a wild goose chase to track down a man who has duped them both into believing they were the one.  This comedy starred Peter Coyote and Bette Midler.  Can you name the film?
options: Down and Out in Beverly Hills
questions.explanation:
Outrageous Fortune.

	Bette starred in this comedy with Shelley Long.

questions.text: Three bitter former college friends form a group to get back at their ex-husbands for their infidelities.  Can you name this 1996 comedy that starred Bette Midler and Diane Keaton?
questions.explanation:
The First Wives Club.

	This all-star movie showcased the talent of Sarah Jessica Parker, Goldie Hawn, Stockard Channing, and Elizabeth Berkley.  Cameo appearance in the film include Ivana Trump and Kathie Lee Gifford.

questions.text: Diane Keaton starred as a woman facing cancer who is reunited with her sister played by Meryl Streep in what 1996 drama?
questions.explanation:
Marvin's Room.

	Diane and Meryl play two sisters, Bessie and Lee, who are brought back together and face life dealing with their father who is a stroke victim.  It is discovered that Bessie is suffering from cancer and Lee's son is the only one who can help her.  This film also starred Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert DeNiro and Kelly Ripa.

questions.text: Meryl Streep portrays a journalist who becomes deeply involved with a man who knows a lot about flowers.  In this dual story lined film she stars a long side Nicolas Cage who portrays twin writers one of which has been selected to write a screenplay for her book.  Which Oscar nominated film am I referring to?
questions.explanation:
Adaptation.

	This highly acclaimed film was nominated for several Academy Awards but only received one.  Chris Cooper won for his performance as John Laroche in his supporting role of the film.  Nicolas Cage was nominated for his leading performance but failed to pick up the Oscar.  This completes my first degree quiz.  I hope you enjoyed it.
